Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs after 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' following 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that are immediately followed by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' appears more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurring in variants that include 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' in cases with total amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' relative to the frequency of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of process variants where 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' directly follows a rejection by any approver (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', or 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER')
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that originate from a domestic trip reimbursement request (inferred via absence of pre-approval steps)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases where 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' in variants that loop back to resubmission and ultimately succeed (i.e., end in 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' events that occur within two months of the initial 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' instances that are part of rework cycles involving three or more rejections before final approval
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities
